alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Holt; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 8:42PM CDT until April 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR DONIPHAN...ATCHISON...CENTRAL BUCHANAN...SOUTHEASTERN HOLT... NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHWESTERN ANDREW COUNTIES... At 842 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fillmore to near Ozawkie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Effingham, Amazonia, Rushville, Lancaster, Denton, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Severance, Farmington and Huron. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 40 and 69. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
